title: Supporting sustainability, digital health, and the future of work
summary: MIT and Accenture Convergence Initiative has selected three research projects to receive support. The projects focus on sustainability, digital health, and the future of work. The first project aims to identify how industrial clusters can facilitate the transition to clean energy. The second project aims to create a return-on-investment calculator for childhood obesity interventions. The third project aims to use AI algorithms to reshape the future of work in the post-pandemic era. The research teams include experts from MIT and Accenture.
